subject: Know instantly if you are approved
body:
251839499Can't read or see this email? Please go here.  You must be 18 years old to participate.









If you're having problems getting a credit card due to past credit history, this may be the offer for you.  To apply is quick and easy.  Your First PREMIER Bank Gold Card will feature:



Low APR on Purchases



24 Hour account access by phone



Monthly credit bureau reporting





































If you received this message in error or if you wish to be removed from this mailing list, please follow this link.163 3rd Avenue, #277, New York, NY 10003
